Ability.Name: --- initialize ---
Ability.Lua:
if not xeroninit then
function SpecialAggro(t) local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "AmaniÂ´shi Hatcher", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot", "Icy Tomb", "Risen Ghoul", "Mana Void", "Burning Tendons", "Wing Tentacle", "Arm Tentacle", "Twilight Assault Drake", "Goriona", "Ice Tomb", "Twilight Sapper", "Dreadlord Debilitator" } for _,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName(t) == v then return true end end end
function ImmuneTarget(t) local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977, 102915, 100686, 105784, 74938 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
function HoldCooldown(cd) if GetMinimapZoneText() == "Deathwing" and UnitName("target") ~= "Burning Tendons" and cd >= 1 then return true end if UnitName("target") == "Warlord Zon'ozz" and not UnitDebuffID("target",104031) and cd >= 3 then return true end if UnitName("boss1") == "Alysrazor" and not UnitDebuffID("boss1",99432) and cd >= 3 then return true end end
if UnitLevel("player") ~= 85 then print("\124cFFD12727WARNING: \124cFFFFFFFFLevel 85 is required to use this profile properly") end
if GetLocale() ~= "enUS" then print("\124cFFD12727WARNING: \124cFFFFFFFFenUS language pack is required to use this profile properly") end
print("Sheuron initialized, ver: \124cFFFFE6402012.02.08") xeroninit = true
end
if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or UnitBuffID("player",80169) or UnitBuffID("player",87959) or UnitChannelInfo("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: --- offensive spells ---
Ability.Lua:
if UnitDebuffID("target",8050,"PLAYER") and IsControlKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then TargetNearestEnemy() end
if UnitIsDead("target") or ImmuneTarget("target") or not UnitCanAttack("player","target") or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not SpecialAggro("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) or IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(403)),"target") == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: --- special events ---
Ability.Lua:
-- Avoid sudden death on Ultraxion local fadingtime = select(7,UnitDebuffID("player",110070)) if fadingtime and fadingtime - GetTime() < 1.3 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Avoid Hour of Twilight on Ultraxion, Delete next 3 lines if you are working as tank local channelSpell, _, _, _, _, endTime = UnitCastingInfo("boss1") if channelSpell == GetSpellInfo(109417) and endTime/1000 - GetTime() < 1.3 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Avoid sudden death on Madness local tentacledeath = select(7,UnitDebuffID("player",109597)) if tentacledeath and tentacledeath - GetTime() < 1 then RunMacroText("/click ExtraActionButton1") end
-- Try to aim on Darkmoon Faerie Cannon local canontime = select(7,UnitBuffID("player",102116)) if canontime and canontime - GetTime() < 1.15 then CancelUnitBuff("player","Magic Wings") end

Ability.Name: Flametongue Weapon
Ability.Lua:
local WEnchant,WEnchantExpires = GetWeaponEnchantInfo()
if ( not WEnchant or ( Wenchant and WEnchantExpires/60000 < 10 and not UnitAffectingCombat("player") ) ) and GetSpellCooldown(8024) == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: Lightning Shield
Searing Totem
Ability.Lua: if select(3,GetTotemInfo(1)) == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: Flame Shock
Ability.Lua:
local debuff,_,_,_,_,_,endtime = UnitDebuffID("target",8050,"PLAYER")
if not debuff or ( endtime and endtime - GetTime() < 2 ) then return true end

Ability.Name: Lava Burst
Earth Shock
Ability.Lua:
local ShieldStacks = select(4,UnitBuffID("player",324))
if ShieldStacks and ShieldStacks > 6 and not IsControlKeyDown() then return true end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Elemental Mastery
Ability.Lua: if UnitHealthMax("target") > UnitHealthMax("player")*10 then return true end

Ability.Name: Call of the Elements
Ability.Lua: if select(3,GetTotemInfo(2)) == 0 and select(3,GetTotemInfo(3)) == 0 and select(3,GetTotemInfo(4)) == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: Assist Tank
Ability.Lua:
if GetNumPartyMembers() > 0 and not UnitInRaid("player") then
local heisthetank = nil
for i = 1, GetNumPartyMembers(), 1 do if UnitGroupRolesAssigned("party"..tostring(i)) == "TANK" then heisthetank = "party"..tostring(i) end end
if heisthetank and not UnitExists("target") and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank) and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank.."target") and not UnitIsDead(heisthetank.."target") and UnitCanAttack("player",heisthetank.."target") then TargetUnit(heisthetank.."target") end
end

Ability.Name: Chain Lightning
Earthquake
Ability.Lua: if IsControlKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then return true end

Ability.Name: Fire Nova
Ability.Lua: if IsControlKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then return true end

Ability.Name: Totemic Recall
Ability.Lua:
local airtotem = select(3,GetTotemInfo(4))
if airtotem ~= 0 and GetTime() - airtotem > 5 and not UnitBuffID("player",2895) then return true end

Ability.Name: Spiritwalker's Grace
Blood Fury
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellKnown(33697) then return true end

Ability.Name: USE: Gloves
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",10)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil then UseInventoryItem(10) return true end

Ability.Name: USE: Trinket 1
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil then UseInventoryItem(13) return true end

Ability.Name: USE: Trinket 2
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil then UseInventoryItem(14) return true end
